vendor_name: InterContinental Dominica Cabrits Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel
title: Secluded Caribbean Five-Star Beachfront Resort within Cabrits National Park
description: Escape to a dreamy island paradise in the middle of the Caribbean Sea with a stay at the five-star InterContinental Dominica Cabrits Resort & Spa - perfectly inspired by the lush nature of Cabrits National Park that surrounds this beachfront oasis. Dive directly into the aquamarine sea, sip on a cocktail at the Swim-Up Bar, dine on local island cuisine at Kwéyòl Beach Restaurant, and savour the enriching seclusion of this once-in-a-lifetime escape with a lavish treatment at Cabrits Spa.
location_description: InterContinental Dominica Cabrits Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Bellhall Road, Douglas Bay Cabrits National Park, Portsmouth, Dominica

title: Portsmouth Getaway near Gunwharf Quays with Indoor Pool & Restaurant
description: Discover the headquarters of England's Royal Navy when you stay at Holiday Inn Portsmouth, an IHG Hotel. Surrounded by green lawns, the hotel is perfectly placed for a quick stroll to the shore and a 15-minute walk to Gunwharf Quays, where you'll discover the HMS Warrior and the Blue Reef Aquarium. Back at your hotel, head to the restaurant for British comfort food with a Mediterranean twist, or indulge in a treatment at the onsite salon and spa.
location_description: Holiday Inn Portsmouth, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Pembroke Road, Portsmouth, Hampshire, PO1 2TA United Kingdom
